agency_desc: A nonprofit organization providing support services to those who are recovering from substance use, mental health challenges, trauma, homelessness, and systemic racism.
service_description: Provides support, resources, and a community of care to those in recovery. Services include instruction how to manage mental health, maintain sobriety, and build community.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Visit website or call for information.
site_eligibility: Individuals recovering from substance use, mental health challenges, trauma, homelessness, and systemic racism.

agency_desc: A nonprofit community organization that provides services to those in need. Services include early head start, head start, health clinic, Energy Assistance Program, weatherization, and small business loans.
site_name: PACE HEALTH CONNECTION CLINIC - SULLIVAN COUNTY
service_description: Provides free weatherization for eligible moderate- to low-income homeowners and renters. Services include an energy audit, installing insulation, reducing air infiltration, performing heating tune-ups, and when necessary, replacing faculty units. Applications are accepted at local offices during energy assistance seasons.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_schedule: Mon 9am-noon and 1pm-5:30pm; Tues and Wed 8am-noon and 1pm-4:30pm
Mon 9am-noon and 1pm-5:30pm; Tues and Wed 8am-noon and 1pm-4:30pm

Mon 9am-noon and 1pm-5:30pm; Tues and Wed 8am-noon and 1pm-4:30pm
site_eligibility: Living in Daviess, Greene, Knox, or Sullivan County --Living in the home (either as an owner or a renter) -- With household income at or below 200% federal poverty guidelines and/or receiving SSI or TANF -- Priority given to applicants who are elderly, have disabilities, or have children under age 18

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
taxonomy_name: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
nameLevel4: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides free or low-cost flu vaccinations to Sullivan County residents beginning in mid-October until the supply is depleted.
site_details: Walk-ins accepted during clinic hours; appointment preferred.
site_eligibility: Living in Sullivan County -- Uninsured, with insurance that does not cover vaccine, receiving Medicaid

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
service_description: Offers a quarterly support group for persons with diabetes and their support persons. Topics include meal planning, medications, exercise, and lifestyle issues.
site_details: Call for registration or visit the website for more information.
site_eligibility: Persons of any age diagnosed with diabetes and their support persons

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
site_name: SULLIVAN COUNTY COMMUNITY HOSPITAL- FAMILY PRACTICE ASSOCIATES QUICKCARE
service_description: Provides a nurse-practitioner clinic for treatment of minor illnesses and injuries, as well as X-ray services, laboratory testing, and physicals for employment, sports, and school.
site_details: Walk in; no appointments accepted.
site_schedule: Mon and Thurs-Sat 7:30am-4pm; Tues and Wed 7:30am-6:30pm
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: The County Clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities, administers jury draw, child support collections, and voter registration, issues marriage licenses and records state tax liens in Sullivan County.
service_description: Processes court-ordered child support payments in the county and provides records of payment history. Payer and payee must keep their names and addresses current with this office; any changes must be made in writing.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Payment history print out: Walk in to obtain. -- Update name/address: Walk in or mail changes. -- Payment Information: Visit website or call the Indiana Kids Line.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: Parents ordered by the court to pay or receive child support

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Files, modifies, and enforces court-ordered child support cases in Sullivan County.
site_details: To apply for child support or request child support enforcement or modification, call the prosecutor's office to schedule an appointment. -- For payment information, call the Indiana Kids Line.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: To File for Child Support Assistance: Living in Sullivan County -- Parent, guardian, aunt, uncle, or grandparent who has physical custody of a child (ages 0-18) -- Requiring financial support from a noncustodial parent of the child

agency_name: NORTHEAST SCHOOL CORPORATION OF SULLIVAN COUNTY
agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
site_name: NORTHEAST SCHOOL CORPORATION OF SULLIVAN COUNTY
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_name: SOUTHWEST SCHOOL CORPORATION OF SULLIVAN COUNTY
agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
site_name: SOUTHWEST SCHOOL CORPORATION OF SULLIVAN COUNTY
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: "OVGC is an investor-owned utility which provides natural gas distribution and transportation services to residential, commercial, industrial, and governmental customers in 16 Indiana counties and 1 county in Ohio."
site_name: OHIO VALLEY GAS CORPORATION - SULLIVAN DISTRICT
service_description: Provides natural gas utility services and handles billing and connections/disconnections for customers in select areas of Gibson, Greene, Knox, Pike, Sullivan, and Vigo County. Special payment plans, including a budget payment plan to spread the cost of service out more equally throughout the year, may be available for customers.
site_details: Walk in, call, or visit the website for information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A government agency that administers housing assistance programs.
service_description: Provides subsidized rental units in the city of Sullivan in Sullivan County to eligible low-income families and persons. A wait list is maintained when all units are full. Monthly rent is approximately 30% of adjusted gross income.
site_details: Walk in for application; return completed application by appointment. -- Applications are available between automated doors of Sunrise Towers 24/7.
site_eligibility: Low income -- US citizens and eligible immigrants -- No rent or judgment owed to previous landlords -- Satisfactory criminal history; ask for information

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Offers home delivery of library materials to people living within Sullivan city limits who are homebound due to illness or disability.
site_details: Call to request service.
site_eligibility: Living in Sullivan County -- Homebound due to illness or disability

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call or visit the website for information. www.sullivan.lib.in.us
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living in Sullivan County

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services for the town of Hymera in Sullivan County.
service_description: Provides water and sanitary sewer utility services for Jackson Township of Sullivan County.
site_details: Call or walk in for assistance. Bills may be paid in person or by mail; a drop box is located at this address. Completed application required for new service.
site_eligibility: Open; serves Jackson Township of Sullivan County

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Sullivan County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Sullivan County, including performing the following duties: Controls, maintains, and supervises county property -- Audits and authorizes claims against the county -- Receives bids for and authorizes county contracts -- Performs certain election functions -- Handles appeals of township trustee decisions
site_details: Call for assistance.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: Monthly 1st and 3rd Mon 7pm
Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: Monthly 1st and 3rd Mon 7pm
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides shelter for stray and unwanted animals and rehomes animals through adoption.
service_description: Accepts donations of pet food and supplies for shelter use. Needed items often include pet food. Volunteers to assist with shelter duties, including cleaning, are also welcome.
site_details: Call or walk in during business hours to make donation arrangements or to inquire about volunteering.
site_schedule: Mon, Wed, Thurs, and Fri 10am-4pm; Tues noon-4pm; Sat 10am-2pm
Mon, Wed, Thurs, and Fri 10am-4pm; Tues noon-4pm; Sat 10am-2pm

site_eligibility: To Donate: Open -- To Volunteer: Age 16 or older (minors must have parent/guardian permission)

agency_desc: Government agency that locates, identifies, and appraises all taxable property in Sullivan County.
service_description: Calculates the value of all taxable property in Sullivan County, which is then used to assess taxes. Hears appeals of assessments, oversees reassessments, and maintains information on boundaries and ownership.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information. www.sullivancounty.in.gov
site_eligibility: Varies by service; limited to taxable property in Sullivan County

agency_desc: Provides maintenance services on public roads and streets in Sullivan County.
service_description: Maintains county roadways and ditches in Sullivan County, including patching, paving, snow removal, roadside mowing, and drainage along roadways.
site_details: Call for information or to report a problem. To report urgent problems after hours, call 9-1-1 or Sullivan County dispatch.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to county roads and properties in Sullivan County)

agency_desc: Oversees both criminal and civil trials, including juvenile and family cases, in Sullivan County.
service_description: Oversees both criminal and civil trials, including juvenile and family cases, in Sullivan County.
site_details: Varies; cases are generally initiated through the prosecutor's office, private attorneys -- individuals representing themselves. For juror information, contact the courts directly.
site_eligibility: Persons named in cases or called for jury duty at this court

agency_desc: Oversees both criminal and civil trials, including juvenile and family cases, in Sullivan County.
service_description: Handles civil lawsuits for $10,000 or less, including contracts, collection of rent, evictions, and personal loans. Only corporations are required to be represented by an attorney and only on claims equal to or under $6,000. In Sullivan County, the Superior Court handles small claims cases.
site_details: Call or walk in to the County Clerk's office for claim forms.
site_eligibility: To file a lawsuit: Age 18 or older -- With a civil claim for less than $10,000 -- Meeting one of the following three requirements: Person being sued lives or works in Sullivan County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit took place in Sullivan County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit was to be performed in Sullivan County

agency_desc: Provides emergency fire and medical services in the city of Sullivan in Sullivan County.
service_description: Responds to fire, emergency medical, hazardous material, and special rescue situations in the city of Sullivan and Hamilton Township in Sullivan County. Non-emergency services include fire prevention education and public awareness. www.cityPersons in need of emergency services should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For nonemergency services, call the office during business hours.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services to the city of Sullivan.
service_description: Provides street and sidewalk maintenance for the city of Sullivan in Sullivan County. Services include snow removal, street sweeping, pothole repair, mowing right-of-ways, dead animal pick-up, yard waste removal, mosquito spraying, and maintenance of traffic lights and signs.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Services
site_details: Call for information or to make a report.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including a food pantry and soup kitchen.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to people in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Pull up to the kitchen door to receive food basket.
site_eligibility: Living in Shelburn -- Not used this pantry in the past 30 days

agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including a meal site.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to those in need. Perishable food may be available depending on donations.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Call to make an appointment.
site_eligibility: Veteran, surviving spouses or children of a veteran

agency_desc: A 24-hour crisis intervention agency that provides inpatient and outpatient behavioral health care; mental health and addictions treatment for all ages.
service_name: OUTPATIENT MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES - SULLIVAN COUNTY
service_description: Provides individual, group, couple, and family counseling for adults, adolescents, and children. Also offers psychiatric and psychological assessment, consultation, and treatment services.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Call the office for information or to a schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Open (minimum age served determined by individual assessment) -- Living in Clay, Sullivan, or Vigo county
